metadata.title: CVE-2020-10969 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.10.4 mishandles the interactionbetween serialization gadgets and typing, related tojavax.swing.JEditorPane.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-10969` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjackson2-databind-java - 2.4.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm2').
